languages.text: Теодора фон Валанциус небезосновательно считала, что тайны находятся в лучшей сохранности, когда о них известно лишь одному человеку — ей самой.

traits.locale_text: Теодора фон Валанциус небезосновательно считала, что тайны находятся в лучшей сохранности, когда о них известно лишь одному человеку — ей самой.

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.
languages.original_text: Теодора фон Валанциус небезосновательно считала, что тайны находятся в лучшей сохранности, когда о них известно лишь одному человеку — ей самой.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.
Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.
Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.
Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.
Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.
Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius'un, sırların yalnızca bir kişi tarafından bilindiğinde daha iyi saklandığına inanmak için iyi bir sebebi vardı: Kendisi.
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius'un, sırların yalnızca bir kişi tarafından bilindiğinde daha iyi saklandığına inanmak için iyi bir sebebi vardı: Kendisi.

languages.text: シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、秘密はその存在を自分だけが知っているときにこそ安全に守られると固く信じていた。
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.

traits.locale_text: シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、秘密はその存在を自分だけが知っているときにこそ安全に守られると固く信じていた。

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius hatte guten Grund, zu glauben, dass Geheimnisse gewahrt werden sollten, wenn nur eine Person von ihnen weiß ... sie selbst.
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius hatte guten Grund, zu glauben, dass Geheimnisse gewahrt werden sollten, wenn nur eine Person von ihnen weiß ... sie selbst.

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius était persuadée, à raison, que les secrets les mieux gardés étaient ceux dont elle seule avait connaissance.
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius était persuadée, à raison, que les secrets les mieux gardés étaient ceux dont elle seule avait connaissance.

languages.text: Theodora von Valancius tenía motivos para creer que los secretos estaban más seguros cuando solo los conocía una persona: ella misma.
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.

traits.locale_text: Theodora von Valancius tenía motivos para creer que los secretos estaban más seguros cuando solo los conocía una persona: ella misma.

languages.text: 西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯深信：秘密最好只由一个人知晓，而那个人就是她自己。
languages.original_text: Theodora von Valancius had good reason to believe that secrets are better kept safe when only one person knows of their existence — herself.

traits.locale_text: 西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯深信：秘密最好只由一个人知晓，而那个人就是她自己。
